name: Bring Me a Head!
storyline:
It's that time again. Duc's got himself into another fit. Wants someone's head. And it's your job to do the hacking, what with your being the royal executioner and all.

Better hope you can hack it.
summary: Bring Me a Head! is a choice-based text adventure horror game about an executioner. It was a Grand Guignol entry for ECTOCOMP 2016.
